description: This table contains dental alternate procedure choices for a procedure.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DENT_ALT_DFLT_EST_YN
columns.description:
Indicates that a given procedure alternative should be included on an estimate by default


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DENT_ALT_EST_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates that a given procedure alternative should be included as a particular type for estimates, such as Basic Covered Benefit. These categories are also used by the Estimates activity for non-Substatus values.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Choice


Basic Covered Benefit
